gcci.text: With H100s averaging $3.21/hr, tightening foundry capacity and lingering supply constraints keep capex elevated while second-hand inventory starts to moderate pricing for hyperscalers.

gtpi.text: Average input prices near $1.25/1M tokens intensify API price wars, driving faster efficiency gains and model consolidation as providers trade margin for adoption.

aipi.text: Capital inflows and capacity announcements signal momentum, yet stretched valuation multiples and execution risk across models keep sustainability and potential bubble dynamics in focus.
